metadataToESConfigType.description: Pipeline Source Config Metadata Pipeline type

regionName.title: AWS Region Name
regionName.description: Region name. Required when using AWS Credentials.

caCerts.title: CA Certificates
caCerts.description: Certificate path to be added in configuration. The path should be local in the Ingestion Container.

useSSL.title: Use SSL
useSSL.description: Indicates whether to use SSL when connecting to ElasticSearch. By default, we will ignore SSL settings.

verifyCerts.title: Validate Certificates
verifyCerts.description: Indicates whether to verify certificates when using SSL connection to ElasticSearch. Ignored by default. Is set to true, make sure to send the certificates in the property `CA Certificates`.

useAwsCredentials.title: Use AWS Credentials
useAwsCredentials.description: Indicates whether to use aws credentials when connecting to OpenSearch in AWS.

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Maximum number of events entities in a batch (Default 1000).
